HumanByteSize.description: A human-readable byte size string, e.g., '2mb'. For kb, mb, etc it will use base 10 parsing (1kb = 1000 bytes). For bases 2 parsing using IEC (2kib = 1024 bytes).

HumanDuration.description: A human-readable duration string, e.g., '10s', '20h', '2d3h', etc.

ImagePublicUrlString.description: An image represented as a publicly accessible URL.

public_url.description: A publicly accessible URL to the image.

ImagePublicUrl.description: An image represented as a publicly accessible URL.

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the image, e.g., 'image/jpeg'.

ImageBase64.description: An image represented as a base64 encoded string with associated MIME type. This is used to avoid having to store the image on a separate the server. This should be limited to small images less than 100kb in size.

Image.description: An image, either as a publicly accessible URL or as a base64 encoded string.

StringValueInlineString.description: A string value used in configuration

StringValueInlineNumber.description: A boolean value used in configuration

StringValueInlineBool.description: A boolean value used in configuration

value.description: A string value used in configuration.

StringValueDirect.description: A string value used in configuration

StringValueBase64.description: A string value that is encoded as base64 data.

env_var.description: An environment variable from which the value will be read.

default.description: An optional, default value to use if the environment variable is not set.

StringValueEnvVar.description: A string value used in configuration

env_var_base64.description: An environment variable from which the value will be read as base64.

default.description: An optional, default value to use if the environment variable is not set.

StringValueEnvVarBase64.description: A string value used in configuration

path.description: The path of the file to load for the value of the string.

StringValueFile.description: A string value used in configuration

StringValue.description: A string value used in configuration that can be expressed in on of several ways.

StringValueNumber.description: A number value used in configuration that can be expressed in on of several ways. When taken from other sources, the string value is parsed as a number.

StringValueBool.description: A boolean value used in configuration that can be expressed in on of several ways. When taken from other sources, the string value is parsed as a bool.

NamespacePath.description: The fully qualified path to the namespace a resource lives within. For example, 'root/prod/some-feature'. Must begin with 'root'.
